Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.4 Cittasampayuttaduka » 10.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.4.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.4.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
148.
2682Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
<< 10.4.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup10.4.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
